title: RIOT PLS HELP Champion Select Bug
body: Recently I've been having this weird bug where the champion select counter goes to zero and freezes for some time resulting in me losing lp and on my most recent occasion, giving me a loss in my promotion series. Riot pls help and give back me back mah win (ps: chat still worked only the counter and everything else froze). This happened on numerous occasions and this time I took a video of it, how to I upload it?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like you might be experiencing a connection issue.

Could you try temporarily disabling your firewall, this should resolve your issue.

If it does then you'll need to re-enable your firewall and add an exception for league of legends.

Check out the support article below for information.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3
